answers.author: Israel Murguia
answers.text:
Attached are two RFPs for TPAs. The first is from the City of East Moline, IL and the second is from the City of Stockton, CA. I've yet to come across one from a county, but Stockton's is comprehensive. I'll keep searching, but I hope this serves as a starter.

author: Tracy Miller
text:
A Florida Alliance member is seeking sample RFP's related to securing a Third Party Administrator for employee health benefits.  This member is a self-funded County Government with a comprehensive and integrated on-site wellness program.  The county is particularly interested in viewing samples of  Scope of Services in addition to Provider Network management.   
Please respond here or directly to tmiller@transformgov.org.  
Best Regards,  
Tracy Miller  
Florida Regional Director  
Alliance for Innovation
title: RFP's for Third Party Administrators
